issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I am trying to upload my appx file on Windows app store but getting following errors: 

* Error Found: The binary analyzer test detected the following errors:◦File HAL.dll has failed the SafeSEHCheck check.
* Error Found: The supported APIs test detected the following errors:◦API OutputDebugStringA in kernel32.dll is not supported for this application type. appname.exe calls this API.
◦API OutputDebugStringA in kernel32.dll is not supported for this application type. HAL.dll calls this API.
fields.summary: Error while deploying app on Windows App Store

comments.body: Hello, The issue is occur due to the certificate error in publishing apps in Windows store. Please follow the guidence in the documentation link [here|http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Distributing_Windows_Applications]. Also, Here is a link to [similar issue|https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/c4f89179-fa03-435c-8c1b-0e04a00649fa/windows-app-certification-kit-test-results-windows-10?forum=WinPreview2014General] in native platform. Thanks.
